problem.markdown:
What is the Moore's Law curve? ( ) constant ( ) cubic ( ) linear ( ) quadratic (x) exponential
[explanation] A straight line on a linear-log plot is exponential. The idea of doubling every fixed time period should have given that away. [explanation]
problem.p: What is the Moore's Law curve?

div.p: A straight line on a linear-log plot is exponential. The idea of doubling every fixed time period should have given that away.
